name: Blue Hawaiian
preparation:
Not to be confused with the Harry Yee classic, the Blue Hawaii, the Blue Hawaiian is little more than a Piña Colada with an added splash of blue curaçao. Tall, teal and aggressively tropical, it’s the type of drink you’d imagine sipping by the swimming pool, another cocktail du azure.

Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice and shake until well-chilled.

Strain into a Hurricane glass over pebble ice.

Garnish with a pineapple wedge, cherry and cocktail umbrella. into glass.
